name: Theseus (itch) (Dan Harris)
description:
Theseus is a puzzle platformer. You can't jump, but you can grow, you can change, and you can leave some things behind. Play through more than 30 levels, each exploring unique aspects of your abilities.

Left/right arrows or A/D to move.
Press spacebar or right-click mouse to prepare (or cancel) a split (later on in the game)
Press shift to fuse (later on in the game).
Press R to restart and M to mute.

To finish each level, stand on all exit pads -- and don't stand on any blocks that don't have an exit pad.

Demo Feature: Click the arrows at the top-right of the screen to skip a level or go back to the previous one.
